user.title: Leaf Spy
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up Leaf Spy?

abort.one_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is necessary.

create_entry.default:
Open the Leaf Spy app, go to `Menu` -> `Settings` and scroll down to `Server`. 
Change the following settings:
 - `Enable`: Yes
 - `Send Interval` can be whatever you prefer.
 - `ID`: `<Car Name>`
 - `PW`: {secret}
 - `Http` or `Https` depending on the access to your Home Assistant install.
 - `URL`: {url} - Note: **Do not** add http or https to the URL.
